/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban architecture and greenery. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
